column4: I currently have an ATI RADEON xpress 200 video card...i just reinstalled ubuntu (currently 6.06) and my resolutions are messed up. This has happened before and normally i just use "sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg" but when i restart i get a "frequency out of range" error, what should i do?
open up xorg.conf,  find the horizsync  value range and change the end of the range value
search for a line starting with horizsync =  ??????? ,   change the second value in that to 70 or something
